positive_examples: This is an example of peace.
We observed peace in this context.
A typical case of peace would involve these features.
The concept of peace applies here.
A hand gesture where the index and middle fingers are extended in a V-shape while other fingers are folded, symbolizing peace or victory.
negative_examples: This is an example of waving, not peace.
This represents hand gesture in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Waving, or other types of HandGesture

definition: A hand gesture with raised index and middle fingers symbolizing peace.
